Title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+

Description: Diecast vehicle pack featuring Batwheels characters in 1:55 scale Batcast Metal diecast format

Comes with 5 diecast metal vehicles including Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi and Quizz

Working wheels: Push to send characters racing into action

Bring these vehicles to the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave for more racing stunt action (Playsets sold separately and subject to availability.)

Encourages imaginative play and storytelling for preschool kids ages 3 years and older

Bring home epic Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action with these Batwheels die-cast toy cars from Fisher-Price! This vehicle set features 5 characters from the show in 1:55 scale format with authentic Batwheels styling, Batcast Metal die-cast materials, and real working wheels. Preschool kids will love sending their favorite Batwheels and Legion of Zoom characters racing into action! Bring these vehicles to the Batwheels Launch & Race Batcave playset for more exciting, crimefighting pretend play! (Playset sold separately and subject to availability.
